text: A number of CPPs are derived from viral proteins , such tat , VP22 , and FHV . The role of these cell penetrating motifs during infection has yet to be elucidated but it is interesting to see that another obligate intracellular pathogen , Mycobacterium tuberculosis , also possesses a cell wall protein with such a peptide sequence [ 25 ] . CPPs represent an example of how understanding how pathogens interact with human host cells can lead to new ways to treat and prevent viral infections .
